astrazeneca.papragraph-1: AZ had 200 million documents. If you printed them all out they would weigh more than the Titanic.
astrazeneca.papragraph-2: But you needed 100 different applications to search them all.
astrazeneca.papragraph-3: Imagine having to remember 100 different passwords just to search documents at work.
astrazeneca.papragraph-4: We built a framework that gave users a single search application - that searches all the documents for them.
astrazeneca.papragraph-5: The app works on phones, tablets and PCs and requires no training to use.
astrazeneca.papragraph-6: Each month 417,000 new scientific papers uploaded digitally, thatâ€™s enough paper to wallpaper the great pyramid of Giza every 2 days.
astrazeneca.papragraph-7: AZ ran innovation competitions for new ideas, they attracted a relatively small group of people. The ideas were always submitted as lengthy academic documents which limited the number of people capable of suggesting or appraising ideas.
astrazeneca.papragraph-8: So they missed out on the power of the collective brainpower available.
